sn55.53:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
sn55.53:4.2: Atha kho dhammadinno upāsako pañcahi upāsakasatehi saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.53:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho dhammadinno upāsako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.53:4.6: anusāsatu no, bhante, bhagavā yaṃ amhākaṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
sn55.53:5.2: ‘ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatapaṭisaṃyuttā te kālena kālaṃ upasampajja viharissāmā’ti.
sn55.53:5.4: “Na kho netaṃ, bhante, sukaraṃ amhehi puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvasantehi kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhontehi mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayantehi jātarūparajataṃ sādiyantehi—
sn55.53:5.5: ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatapaṭisaṃyuttā te kālena kālaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
sn55.53:5.6: Tesaṃ no, bhante, bhagavā amhākaṃ pañcasu sikkhāpadesu ṭhitānaṃ uttaridhammaṃ desetū”ti.
sn55.53:6.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatā bhavissāma akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.53:7.1: “Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni desitāni, saṃvijjante dhammā amhesu, mayañca tesu dhammesu sandissāma.
